attributes.action: MP's to face criminal charges for fiddling expenses
attributes.additional_details:
If MP's are found to be fiddling expenses, they should automatically face police action.  They should also be made to pay back the expenses with interest.  Also, they should be made to resign with immediate effect and they should NOT be allowed to stand as an MP again.  They should not receive any pay out from the public purse when they do stand down.

Enough is enough.  This country is sick and fed up of the whole expenses issue.
